chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 has a problem:

I am requesting repair or replacement of my iPhone 12 still under warranty, due to the following issues:
The phone drains quickly and turns off with sufficient charge in less than a year, more than expected battery decline using proper chargers.
The battery does not respond properly or registers ghost touches.
The volume changes without being touched and doesn't hear enough.

Thank you,

Hello Pablo: You will find the return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Please choose a location that is most convenient for you to send back your package. You can find a list of delivery points here: https://www.seur.com/en/busqueda-tiendas.do Return preparation: 1. Check the instructions on how to return a product. 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your article. 3. Remove any protective case or screen protector it has. 4. Package the article and its accessories following these guidelines. Packing the article: • The box must be strong and resistant. You should securely place the article inside the box so it doesn't move during transportation. • Stick the return label on top of the box (you can also add an additional label inside to help identify the shipment if the original label peels off or gets damaged). • Take photos of the interior and exterior of your package before sending it. This will protect you in case the article gets damaged during transportation. The return is ready for shipping! We'll notify you when it arrives. Best regards, Back Market Customer Service, Back Market Customer Service

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.

Please provide a solution to the customer within the next (1) business day, or unfortunately we’ll have to refund the order, according to the Back Market Quality Charter.

We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!

Leandra.
Back Market customer Care.

Dear Backcare, 

The refund has been made. 

Regards, 
RK
